body:
Hi

I have multiple python packages installed so I am looking for a way to show which other packages are using these versions of python.

Right now I am using ```spack uninstall /hash.``` which will show the output.  However, this command seems a bit dangerous.  I looked through the [command index](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/command_index.html) but cannot find the solution.

Thanks!
title: List Package Dependencies
